FuncDef: The display ops running context command displays information about system environment variables.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about historical system environment variables.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The OPS supports the following environment variables:
System environment variables: environment variables that are automatically generated during system running. The name of a system environment variable begins with an underscore (_).User environment variables: environment variables that are configured using the environment command.
To view information about current or historical system environment variables, run the display ops running context command.
